info.title: SeanAI Assistance API
info.description: Speech practice and AI-powered analysis API for SpeechFlow. Provides authentication, challenge browsing, practice session management, and AI-driven speech recording analysis.

get.description: Returns all challenge categories ordered by their display order.
Returns all difficulty levels ordered by their display order.
Returns challenges with optional category and level filtering.
Returns a specific challenge by ID, including its category and level.
Returns all practice sessions for the authenticated user, ordered by most recent first.

post.description: Creates a new practice session for the authenticated user, linked to a specific challenge.

challenge_id.description: ID of the challenge to practice

name.description: Optional custom session name. Auto-generated if omitted.

get.description: Returns a specific practice session with its challenge and result.
Returns the authenticated user's profile including computed statistics (sessions count, total minutes, average score) and achievements.

post.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile. Supports partial updates â€” only send the fields you want to change. Profile picture is uploaded as multipart form data.

profile_picture.description: Image file (JPEG, PNG, JPG). Max 2 MB.

delete.description: Permanently deletes the authenticated user's account after verifying their current password. All tokens are revoked immediately.

get.description: Returns all practice sessions for the authenticated user with their challenges and results, ordered by most recent first.
Returns a text summary of the user's progress suitable for sharing on social media or messaging.

summary.example:
John's SpeechFlow Progress:
Sessions: 12

post.summary: Upload a recording for AI analysis
post.description: Uploads an audio recording for a practice session. The audio is sent to the AI speech analysis engine which returns transcription, fluency scores, filler word detection, pace analysis, and personalised recommendations.

practice_session_id.description: ID of the practice session this recording belongs to

audio.description: Audio file (MP3, WAV, M4A). Max 10 MB.

403.description: Session does not belong to the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns an authentication token.
Authenticates a user and returns a Bearer token.
Sends a password reset link to the given email address.

message.example: We have emailed your password reset link.

422.description: Validation error or unable to send reset link

post.description: Resets the user password using the token received by email. All existing tokens are revoked after a successful reset.
